fields.name: Application name (required field)
fields.max_responses: Maximum number of search results to return per query
fields.thread_pool_size: Number of threads for parallel processing
fields.max_file_size_mb: Maximum file size in MB to process
fields.supported_extensions: File extensions that can be processed
fields.auto_discover_files: Automatically find files in resources directory (true/false)
fields.max_files_to_process: Maximum number of files to process when auto_discover_files is true
fields.resources_directory: Directory name where files are located (relative to project root)

usage_examples.auto_discovery_mode: Set auto_discover_files to true and specify max_files_to_process
usage_examples.manual_mode: Set auto_discover_files to false and use 'files' array to specify exact files
